rows.label: qst701004_msg0002
rows.name:
Now you come to mention it, I did
see a ridiculously bubbly Driver. Her
Blade was kind of a buzzkill, though.

rows.label: qst701004_msg0003
rows.name:
They were talking about heading out
of Torigo Village and trying to
climb the Divine Beast's neck or something.

rows.label: qst701004_msg0004
rows.name:
I don't quite remember the name, you see. 
It was lunchtime after all,
I was too busy eating! Haha!
